keyMoments.title: Fukaboshi's 'Reset to Zero' Speech
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi tearfully reveals that Hody is a monster born from Fish-Man Island's environment of hatred. He laments that his mother Otohime was killed by the island's own grudge and begs Luffy to reset their history to zero.
keyMoments.significance: This is the emotional climax where Fukaboshi acknowledges that the island's hatred created monsters like Hody and asks Luffy to break the cycle.
keyMoments.quote: My mother was killed by the hatred of Fish-Man Island itself. Please, Luffy... reset our history to zero!

relationships.description: Fukaboshi asks Luffy to help reset Fish-Man Island's history to zero, establishing a deep bond of trust.

evolutionMoments.description: Fukaboshi makes an emotional plea to Luffy to reset their history, and Luffy accepts, declaring friendship.

reveals.information: Reveals his understanding that his mother was killed by Fish-Man Island's own hatred rather than just by a human assassin

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Young Hody Absorbs Anti-Human Propaganda
keyMoments.description: The flashback reveals young Hody Jones in the Fish-Man District listening to fish-men preach about how humans are an inferior species, absorbing this hateful ideology from his environment.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes that Hody's hatred is environmental and inherited rather than based on personal trauma, making him represent systemic racism.
keyMoments.quote: Humans are an inferior species running rampant and threatening fish-menkind!

keyMoments.title: Hody Joins the Neptune Army
keyMoments.description: The flashback shows Hody Jones as a Neptune Army soldier, having joined solely to gain military knowledge while secretly committing crimes.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Hody's calculated approach and betrayal of the kingdom he pretended to serve.

keyMoments.title: Hody Celebrates Otohime's Death
keyMoments.description: In flashback, Hody and his officers toast to Queen Otohime's assassination, declaring it natural for those who yield to humans to die.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the depth of their hatred and ideology, revealing they saw their own queen's murder as righteous.
keyMoments.quote: The shameless have been judged. It is the natural order for those who yield to humans to die.

keyMoments.title: Hody Steals and Produces Energy Steroids
keyMoments.description: The flashback reveals that Hody stole Energy Steroids from the Tamatebako and began mass-producing them.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals how Hody obtained the power-enhancing drugs and shows his long-term planning.

relationships.description: Hody admired Arlong's anti-human ideology and sought to emulate his approach.

reveals.information: Hody's hatred of humans comes from environmental indoctrination, not personal experience - humans did 'nothing' to him directly
Hody celebrated Queen Otohime's assassination and saw it as righteous judgment
Hody stole Energy Steroids from the Tamatebako while serving in the Neptune Army

keyMoments.title: Luffy Accepts Fukaboshi's Request
keyMoments.description: Luffy gladly accepts Fukaboshi's request to reset Fish-Man Island to zero, declaring the island's residents as his friends.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy takes on the burden of breaking the cycle of hatred, showing his growth as someone who can heal communities.
keyMoments.quote: Leave it to me! You're all my friends!

keyMoments.title: Luffy Declares Friendship with Fish-Man Island
keyMoments.description: Luffy announces through the intercom that the Straw Hats will protect Fish-Man Island and declares them all friends.
keyMoments.significance: Solidifies the bond between the Straw Hats and Fish-Man Island, officially making them allies.
keyMoments.quote: From the moment we entered the plaza, we decided we would not let anyone touch this island. Leave everything to us. We are friends after all!

relationships.description: Luffy accepts Fukaboshi's request to reset Fish-Man Island's history and declares friendship.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy accepts Fukaboshi's emotional plea and declares Fish-Man Island as friends.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Dominates Hyouzou
keyMoments.description: Zoro effortlessly cuts off Hyouzou's swords and mocks him, demonstrating the vast power gap between them despite Hyouzou being Fish-Man Island's best swordsman.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's post-timeskip power increase and how much the Straw Hats have grown.
keyMoments.quote: You can't even kill my boredom.

keyMoments.title: Franky Fireball Against Ikaros Much
keyMoments.description: Franky debuts his Franky Fireball technique, shooting a fireball from his mouth during his battle with Ikaros Much.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Franky's post-timeskip fire-based abilities and versatility in combat.

abilities.description: Franky shoots a fireball from his mouth out of the chest cavity of his cyborg body.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper's Heavy Gong
keyMoments.description: Chopper reveals his new Heavy Point form and uses Heavy Gong against Dosun's T-Shot attack.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Chopper's post-timeskip improvements to his Heavy Point transformation.

abilities.description: A powerful attack using Chopper's Heavy Point form.

keyMoments.title: Ikaros Much's Wings and Ink Clone Techniques
keyMoments.description: Ikaros Much demonstrates his 'Wings of Ikaros' spitting attack and uses squid ink to create clone doubles to evade attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the combat abilities of one of the New Fish-Man Pirates officers.

keyMoments.title: Young Ikaros in Fish-Man District
keyMoments.description: Shown in flashback as a young fish-man absorbing anti-human ideology alongside Hody and other future officers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the origins of the New Fish-Man Pirates' hatred.

abilities.description: A spitting attack using giant squid abilities.
Creates clone doubles using squid ink to evade attacks.

reveals.information: Was indoctrinated with anti-human ideology as a child in the Fish-Man District

keyMoments.title: Young Dosun in Fish-Man District
keyMoments.description: Shown in flashback as a young fish-man absorbing anti-human ideology alongside Hody and other future officers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the origins of the New Fish-Man Pirates' hatred.

reveals.information: Was indoctrinated with anti-human ideology as a child in the Fish-Man District

keyMoments.title: Zoro Dominates Hyouzou
keyMoments.description: Despite being Fish-Man Island's best swordsman and being powered by Energy Steroids, Hyouzou is effortlessly defeated by Zoro who cuts off his swords and mocks him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power gap between Fish-Man Island's strongest and the post-timeskip Straw Hats.
